title: Melissa Hoskins’ Parents Share Grief of Olympian’s Passing: ‘We Are Utterly Devastated’
content:
A memorial service is scheduled for after the Santos Tour Down Under: 'This is a very difficult and tragic time.'

Read the full article at Melissa Hoskins’ Parents Share Grief of Olympian’s Passing: ‘We Are Utterly Devastated’ on Velo.
author: ahood
